Package org.trabalhoPoo.emails

Class AbstractEmail

java.lang.Object
org.trabalhoPoo.emails.AbstractEmail
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmailHtlmRunnable, EmailWithAttachmentInterfaceRunnable, SimpleEmailInterfaceRunnable
public abstract class AbstractEmail extends Object
Classe abstrata que contém os atributos e métodos comuns a todos os tipos de email
